title: Pink Breakfast Bowl
directions: Place first six ingredients in a bowl and top with a sprinkling of hemp seeds, a handful of dried fruit, and an additional splash of your favorite milk. Best eaten immediately.
Nutrition score per serving: 365 calories, 10g fat, 54g carbs, 11g protein
ingredients: 3/4 cup cooked leftover grains (quinoa, rice, or millet)
1 tablespoon raw or lightly toasted sunflower or pumpkin seeds, or coarsely chopped nuts
1/2 to 1 cup unsweetened plain or vanilla almond, soy, rice, or hemp milk
Goji berries, raisins, or chopped dates
